description: This weekend, personal finance expert Carmen Wong Ulrich debuts as the new host of Marketplace Money. We'll have a round-up of personal-finance headlines in the news and a discussion on how keeping secrets about money affects relationships. Plus, a debate about whether or not marriage should be viewed as a financial contract. We'll answer questions about credit card debt, early retirement and the role credit history plays in personal identity from our listeners.

title: Marketplace Money for Friday, November 1, 2013
byline: Stan Alcorn, Carmen Wong Ulrich, Daryl Paranada and Raghu Manavalan
